title: Authors and Citation
text: Nicola Rennie. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Rennie N (2023). aRt: Generative Art R. R package version 1.4.2, https://nrennie.github.io/aRt/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {aRt: Generative Art with R},   author = {Nicola Rennie},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 1.4.2},   url = {https://nrennie.github.io/aRt/}, }

title: Generative Art with R
text: aRt R package create generative art.

title: Generative Art with R
text: Install using:
code: devtools::install_github("nrennie/aRt") remotes::install_github("nrennie/aRt")

title: Generative Art with R
text: functions previous releases {aRt} package took names colour palettes arguments. colour palettes came external R packages, names palettes necessarily obvious. functions updated allow choice colours, rather restricting user single package choose palettes.

title: Generative Art with R
text: examples (including code) can found website.

what: aRt: Generative Art with R — aRt-package
title: aRt: Generative Art with R — aRt-package
text: Creates generative art using R.

title: aRt: Generative Art with R — aRt-package
text: Maintainer: Nicola Rennie nrennie35@gmail.com

title: Abacus — abacus
text: function generates generative art ggplot object using points lines.

title: Abacus — abacus
code: abacus(   nx = 30,   ny = 100,   max_size = 2,   main_col = "black",   bg_col = "white",   s = 123 )

title: Abacus — abacus
text: nx Number lines x direction. Default 30. ny Number points per line. Default 100. max_size Maximum size points. Default 2. main_col Vector colours (single colour). Default "black". bg_col Background colour. Default "white". s Random seed. Default 123.

title: Abacus — abacus
text: ggplot object.

title: Attraction — attraction
text: function generates generative art ggplot object using strange attractors.

title: Attraction — attraction
code: attraction(   n = 5000,   a = -3,   b = 1,   c = 0.5,   d = -1,   main_col = "black",   bg_col = "white" )

title: Attraction — attraction
text: n Number points. Default 5000. Parameter. Default -3. b Parameter. Default 1. c Parameter. Default 0.5. d Parameter. Default -1. main_col Vector colours (single colour). Default "black". bg_col Background colour. Default "white".

title: Attraction — attraction
text: ggplot object.

title: Black Hole — black_hole
text: function generates generative art ggplot object using points.

title: Black Hole — black_hole
code: black_hole(   r_max = c(50, 150, 250, 350),   n = 10000,   lim = 300,   main_cols = rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 7, name = "SunsetDark"),   bg_col = "black",   size = 0.01,   a = 0.5,   s = 1234 )

title: Black Hole — black_hole
text: r_max Vector radii internal circle. Default c(50, 150, 250, 350). n Number points per circle. Default 10000. lim Numeric specifying size grid. Default 400. main_cols Vector colours (single colour). Default rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 7, name = "SunsetDark"). bg_col Background colour. Default "black". size Size points. Default 0.01. Transparency points. Default 0.5. s Random seed. Default 1234.

title: Black Hole — black_hole
text: ggplot object.

title: Blending — blending
text: function generates generative art ggplot object using random walk.

title: Blending — blending
code: blending(n = 100, down = "white", up = "black", s = 1234)

title: Blending — blending
text: n Number point. Default 100. Colour use bottom. Default "white". Colour use top. Default "black". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Blending — blending
text: ggplot object.

title: Boxes — boxes
text: function generates coloured generative art ggplot object treemaps.

title: Boxes — boxes
code: boxes(   n = 100,   perc = 0.1,   col_palette = rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 7, "DarkMint"),   bg_col = "black",   s = 1234 )

title: Boxes — boxes
text: n Number boxes perc Relationship box size colour. Value 0 1 0 represents randomness 1 perfect identical. Default 0.1. col_palette Vector colours. Default "DarkMint" colour palette rcartocolor. bg_col Background colour. Default "black". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Boxes — boxes
text: ggplot object.

title: Bricks — bricks
text: function generates coloured generative art ggplot object using polygons.

title: Bricks — bricks
code: bricks(   n_y = 20,   colours = c("#9B1D20", "#3D2B3D", "#CBEFB6", "#635D5C"),   bg_col = "gray97",   s = 1234 )

title: Bricks — bricks
text: n_y Number rows. Default 20. colours Vector colours. Can length. Default c("#9B1D20", "#3D2B3D", "#CBEFB6", "#635D5C"). bg_col Background colour. Default "gray97". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Bricks — bricks
text: ggplot object.

title: Bubbles — bubbles
text: function generates generative art ggplot object consisting circles filled ellipses.

title: Bubbles — bubbles
code: bubbles(   num_circles = 20,   main_col = "black",   col_palette = rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 12, "Bold"),   bg_col = "white",   s = 1234 )

title: Bubbles — bubbles
text: num_circles Number circles. Default 20. main_col Colour non-highlighted rectangles. Default "black". col_palette Vector colours. Default "Bold" colour palette rcartocolor. Must 12 colours. bg_col Background colour. Default "white". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Bubbles — bubbles
text: ggplot object

title: Bullseye — bullseye
text: function generates layered generative art ggplot object using polar bar charts.

title: Bullseye — bullseye
code: bullseye(main_col = "black", bg_col = "white", s = 1234)

title: Bullseye — bullseye
text: main_col Colour scheme art. One c("mono", "rainbow). Default "black". bg_col Background colour. Default "white". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Bullseye — bullseye
text: ggplot object.

title: Circles — circles
text: function generates coloured generative art ggplot object using dendograms circular graphs.

title: Circles — circles
code: circles(   n = 100,   smoothness = 100,   col_palette = rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 12, "Bold"),   line_col = NA,   bg_col = "black",   s = 1234 )

title: Circles — circles
text: n Number nodes. Default 10. smoothness Smoothness lines circles. Default 100. col_palette Vector colours. Default "Bold" colour palette rcartocolor. line_col Background colour. Default NA. bg_col Background colour. Default "black". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Circles — circles
text: ggplot object.

title: Circular — circular
text: function generates abstract circular generative art ggplot object.

title: Circular — circular
code: circular(n = 100, main_col = "black", bg_col = "white", s = 56)

title: Circular — circular
text: n Number steps inside outside. Default 100. main_col Colour lines. Default black. bg_col Background colour. Default white. s Seed value. Default 56.

title: Circular — circular
text: ggplot object.

title: Connected — connected
text: function generates generative art ggplot object connecting points arcs circle.

title: Connected — connected
code: connected(   n = 100,   n_geom = 2,   random = FALSE,   col_palette = RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(n = 9, "RdPu"),   bg_col = "#ae217e",   s = 1234 )

title: Connected — connected
text: n Number lines start. Default 100. n_geom Number points along path create. Default 2. random Boolean value whether randomise plotting order edges. col_palette Vector colours. Default "RdPu" colour palette RColorBrewer. bg_col Background colour. Default "#ae217e". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Connected — connected
text: ggplot object.

title: Contours — contours
text: function generates generative art ggplot object based elevation data geographic area

title: Contours — contours
code: contours(   xmin = -3.27,   xmax = -3.15,   ymin = 54.43,   ymax = 54.49,   col_palette = MetBrewer::met.brewer("Hokusai3"),   light = "white",   dark = "black",   range = c(0.5, 1) )

title: Contours — contours
text: xmin Minimum x value og geographic area. Default -3.27. xmax Maximum x value og geographic area. Default -3.15. ymin Minimum y value og geographic area. Default 54.43. ymax Maximum y value og geographic area. Default 54.49. col_palette Colour palette colour contours. Default MetBrewer::met.brewer("Hokusai3"). light Colour light shading. Default "white". dark Colour dark shading. Default "black". range Numeric vector length 2 minimum maximum size lines. Default c(0.5, 1).

title: Contours — contours
text: ggplot object.

title: Crawling — crawling
text: function generates generative art ggplot object using dendograms.

title: Crawling — crawling
code: crawling(   n = 50,   edge_colour = "black",   node_size = 1,   node_colour = "black",   bg_col = "white",   s = 1234 )

title: Crawling — crawling
text: n Number nodes. edge_colour Edge colour. Default "black". node_size Node size. Default 1. node_colour Node colour. Default "black". bg_col Background colour. Default "white". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Crawling — crawling
text: ggplot object.

title: Divide — divide
text: function generates coloured generative art ggplot object intersecting lines.

title: Divide — divide
code: divide(   num_lines = 30,   col_palette = PrettyCols::prettycols("TangerineBlues"),   rayshade = FALSE,   s = 1234 )

title: Divide — divide
text: num_lines Number intersecting lines. Default 30. col_palette Vector colours. Default PrettyCols::prettycols("TangerineBlues"). rayshade Boolean determining whether returned plot converted three dimensional using rayshader. TRUE, rayshader required installed. Default FALSE. s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Divide — divide
text: ggplot object.

title: Dots — dots
text: function generates coloured generative art ggplot object using polar coordinates.

title: Dots — dots
code: dots(   n_x = 50,   n_y = 100,   jitter_size_width = 0.5,   jitter_size_height = 0.5,   col_palette = rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 7, "Purp"),   bg_col = "#63589f",   s = 1234 )

title: Dots — dots
text: n_x Number rotational points. Default 50. n_y Number outwards points. Default 100. jitter_size_width Size jitter width. Default 0.5. jitter_size_height Size jitter height. Default 0.5. col_palette Vector colours. Default "Purp" colour palette rcartocolor. bg_col Background colour. Default "#63589f". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Dots — dots
text: ggplot object.

title: Fading — fading
text: function generates coloured generative art ggplot object using voronoi tiles.

title: Fading — fading
code: fading(   n_layers = 6,   n_points = 10,   col_palette = rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 7, "SunsetDark"),   s = 1234 )

title: Fading — fading
text: n_layers Number layers. Default 6. n_points Number points per layer area. Default 10. col_palette Vector colours. Default "SunsetDark" colour palette rcartocolor. s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Fading — fading
text: ggplot object.

title: Flow fields — flow_fields
text: function generates generative art ggplot object using particle traces. See also https://www.williamrchase.com/post/flow-fields-12-months--art-september/

title: Flow fields — flow_fields
code: flow_fields(   n = 10000,   granularity = 1000,   x_freq = 1,   y_freq = 1,   alpha = 1,   line_col = c("#edf8fb", "#bfd3e6", "#9ebcda", "#8c96c6", "#8c6bb1", "#88419d",     "#6e016b"),   bg_col = "lightgrey",   s = 1234 )

title: Flow fields — flow_fields
text: n Number lines. Default 10000. granularity fine draw grid. Default 1000. x_freq Frequency x simplex noise. Default 1. y_freq Frequency y simplex noise. Default 1. alpha Transparency lines. Default 1. line_col Line colours. Vector (single element) colours. Default c("#edf8fb","#bfd3e6","#9ebcda","#8c96c6","#8c6bb1","#88419d","#6e016b") bg_col Background colour. Default "white". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Flow fields — flow_fields
text: ggplot object.

title: Fractals — fractals
text: function generates generative art ggplot object using fractal patterns. Inspired https://www.r-bloggers.com/2010/08/fractals--r/

title: Fractals — fractals
code: fractals(   N = 25,   col_palette = MetBrewer::met.brewer("Demuth", n = 25),   shift = 0,   left = -1,   right = 1,   y_param = 3,   resolution = 0.005,   dist_max = 4 )

title: Fractals — fractals
text: N Number iterations. Default 25. col_palette Vector colours length >= N. Default MetBrewer::met.brewer("Demuth", n = 25). shift Offset y-values. Default 0. left Start rangle x-axis. Default -1. right End range x-axis. Default 1. y_param Rate y growth. Default 3. resolution Resolution grid. Default 0.005. dist_max Size center area. Default 4.

title: Fractals — fractals
text: ggplot object.

title: Lines — lines

text: ggplot object

title: Moiré — moire
text: function creates generative art inspired Moiré effect.

title: Moiré — moire
code: moire(   inner_n = 20,   dist = 10,   inner_col = "grey40",   outer_col = "grey60",   bg_col = "grey10",   inner_r = 0.5,   outer_r = 0.2 )

title: Moiré — moire
text: inner_n Number bottom left circles. Default 20. dist Distance bottom left top right blocks. Default 4. inner_col Colour bottom left circles. Default "grey40". outer_col Colour top right circles. Default "grey60". bg_col Background colour. Default "grey10". inner_r Radius bottom left circles. Default 0.5. outer_r Radius top right circles. Default 0.2.

title: Moiré — moire
text: ggplot object.

title: Mosiac — mosaic
text: function generates generative art ggplot object voronoi tiles.

title: Mosiac — mosaic
code: mosaic(   n = 100,   fill_cols = c("#4B3F72", "#CBB3BF", "#FFC857", "#119DA4", "#19647E"),   line_col = "white",   bg_col = "white",   line_size = 1,   x_means = c(0, 10, 5),   y_means = c(0, 7, 8),   xy_var = 2,   s = 1234 )

title: Mosiac — mosaic
text: n Number points generate tiles . Default 100. fill_cols Vector colours fill tiles , Default c("#4B3F72", "#CBB3BF", "#FFC857", "#119DA4", "#19647E"). line_col Colour lines tiles, Default "white". bg_col Background colour. Default "white". line_size Thickness lines tiles. Default 1. x_means Vector number means x-coordinate. Default c(0, 10, 5). y_means Vector number means y-coordinate. Default c(0, 7, 8). xy_var Numeric varaince x y points. Default 2. s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Mosiac — mosaic
text: ggplot object.

title: Mosiac Sketch — mosaic_sketch
text: n Number points generate tiles . Default 100. fill_cols Vector colours fill tiles , Default c("#4B3F72", "#CBB3BF", "#FFC857", "#119DA4", "#19647E"). line_col Colour lines tiles, Default "white". bg_col Background colour. Default "white". line_size Thickness lines tiles. Default 1. x_means Vector number means x-coordinate. Default c(0, 10, 5). y_means Vector number means y-coordinate. Default c(0, 7, 8). xy_var Numeric varaince x y points. Default 2. s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Mosiac Sketch — mosaic_sketch
text: ggplot object.

title: Polygons — polygons
text: function generates coloured generative art ggplot object using polygons.

title: Polygons — polygons

title: Polygons — polygons
text: n_x Number polygons per row. Default 12. n_y Number polygons per column. Default 18. gap_size Numeric 0 1 specifying size gap polygons. Default 0.5. deg_jitter Numeric 0 0.5 specifying degree jitter. Default 0.1. colours Vector colours. Can length. Default c("#9B1D20", "#3D2B3D", "#CBEFB6", "#635D5C"). rand Boolean whether colours random ordered. Default FALSE. bg_col Background colour. Default "gray97". s Seed value. Default 1234.

text: ggplot object.

title: Rectangles — rectangles
text: n Number rectangles. Default 100. max_height Maximum height rectangle. Default 7. max_width Maximum width rectangle. Default 5. size Line width rectangles. Default 2. main_col Colour non-highlighted rectangles. Default "lightgrey". col_palette Vector colours. Default "Bold" colour palette rcartocolor. Must 12 colours. bg_col Background colour. Default "white". s Seed value. Default 123.

title: Riley — riley
text: function generates coloured generative art ggplot object intersecting lines. Inspired Balm Bridget Riley.

title: Riley — riley
code: riley(n_x = 9, n_y = 9, offset = 3, main_col = "black", bg_col = "white")

title: Riley — riley
text: n_x Number circles x-direction. Default 9. n_y Number circles y-direction. Default 9. offset Numeric giving offset y-axis. Default 3. main_col Main colour. Default "black". bg_col Background colour. Default "white".

title: Riley — riley
text: ggplot object.

title: Shatter — shatter
text: function generates generative art ggplot object using polygons.

title: Shatter — shatter
code: shatter(   n_x = 25,   n_y = 25,   decay = 0.8,   colour = "black",   bg_col = "gray97",   s = 1234 )

title: Shatter — shatter
text: n_x Number polygons per row. Default 25. n_y Number polygons per column. Default 25. decay Numeric 0 1 specifying rate decay square shapes. Default 0.8. colour Single colour fill colour polygons. Default "black". bg_col Single colour background. Default "gray97". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Shatter — shatter
text: ggplot object.

title: Shells — shells
text: function generates layered generative art ggplot object sine cosine waves lines.

title: Shells — shells
code: shells(n = 4, alpha = 1, main_col = "black", bg_col = "white")

title: Shells — shells
text: n Number spirals. Default 4. alpha Transparency lines. Default 1. main_col Colour scheme art. Default "black". bg_col Background colour. Default "white".

title: Shells — shells
text: ggplot object.

title: Smudge — smudge
text: function generates coloured generative art ggplot object contours.

title: Smudge — smudge
code: smudge(   n = 25,   binwidth = 0.01,   col_palette = PrettyCols::prettycols("TangerineBlues"),   s = 1234 )

title: Smudge — smudge
text: n Number grid boxes. Default 25. binwidth Binwidth colours. Default 0.01. col_palette Vector colours. Default PrettyCols::prettycols("TangerineBlues"). s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Smudge — smudge
text: ggplot object.

title: Spirals — spirals
text: function generates generative art ggplot object consisting dots arranged spiral,

title: Spirals — spirals
code: spirals(perc = 0.2, s = 1234)

title: Spirals — spirals
text: perc Percentage data points non-NA. Default 0.2. s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Spirals — spirals
text: ggplot object.

title: Squares — squares
text: function generates generative art ggplot object using pattern-filled squares

title: Squares — squares
code: squares(   n = 7,   line_col = "white",   pattern_col = "white",   pattern_fill = "black",   pattern_size = 0.4,   size = 1.5,   s = 1234 )

title: Squares — squares
text: n Number squares per row. Default 7 line_col Colour lines squares. Default "white". pattern_col Colour pattern lines. Default "white". pattern_fill Colour pattern background. Default "black". pattern_size Size pattern. Default 0.4. size Size lines squares. Default 1.5. s Random seed. Default 1234.

title: Squares — squares
text: ggplot object.

title: Squiggles — squiggles
text: function generates generative art multiple smooth lines.

title: Squiggles — squiggles
code: squiggles(   res = 100,   num_lines = 100,   perc = 0.1,   alpha_low = 0.5,   alpha_high = 1,   line_col = "white",   bg_col = "black",   s = 1234 )

title: Squiggles — squiggles
text: res Resolution grid. Default 100. num_lines Number lines draw. Default 100. perc Percentage colour darker. Default 0.1. alpha_low Transparency majority lines. Default 0.5. alpha_high Transparency minority lines. Default 1. line_col Colour lines. Default "white". bg_col Background colour. Default "black". s Random seed. Default 1234.

title: Squiggles — squiggles
text: ggplot object.

title: Stacked — stacked
text: function generates coloured generative art ggplot object using 3D square polygons.

title: Stacked — stacked
code: stacked(   n_x = 5,   n_y = 5,   col_palette = MetBrewer::met.brewer("Hiroshige", 9),   rayshade = FALSE,   shadow_intensity = 0.5,   sunangle = 315,   s = 1234 )

title: Stacked — stacked
text: n_x Number polygons per row. Default 5. n_y Number polygons per column. Default 5. col_palette Vector colours. Default Hiroshige palette MetBrewer. rayshade Boolean determining whether returned plot converted three dimensional using rayshader. TRUE, rayshader required installed. Default FALSE. shadow_intensity Intensity shading 3D elements, Default 0.5. sunangle Angle sun. Default 315. s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Stacked — stacked
text: ggplot object.

text: perc Percentage data points non-NA. Default 0.1. n Number squares. Default 500. s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Static — static
text: ggplot object.

title: Streams — streams
text: function generates coloured generative art ggplot object stream charts.

title: Streams — streams
text: bg_col Background colour. Default "white". line_col Line colour. Default "white". fill_col Vector fill colours. type Rotation stream. Default "right". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Streams — streams
text: ggplot object.

title: Stripes — stripes
text: function generates generative art ggplot object featuring rows stripes.

title: Stripes — stripes
code: stripes(   perc = 0.5,   n = 3,   col_palette = rcartocolor::carto_pal(n = 7, "TealGrn"),   alpha = 1,   s = 1234 )

title: Stripes — stripes
text: perc Percentage data points sorted. Default 0.5. n Number rows. Default 3. col_palette Vector colours. Default "TealGrn" colour palette rcartocolor. alpha Transparancy fill s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Stripes — stripes
text: ggplot object

title: Sunbursts — sunbursts
text: function generates generative art ggplot object 2d density plots

title: Sunbursts — sunbursts
code: sunbursts(   n = 100,   x_means = c(0, 10, 5),   y_means = c(0, 7, 8),   xy_var = 5,   low = "#074050",   high = "#d3f2a3",   s = 1234 )

title: Sunbursts — sunbursts
text: n Granularity. Default 100. x_means Vector number means x-coordinate. Default c(0, 10, 5). y_means Vector number means y-coordinate. Default c(0, 7, 8). xy_var Numeric varaince x y points. Default 5. low Colour background. Default "#074050". high Colour sunburst points. Default "#d3f2a3". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Sunbursts — sunbursts
text: ggplot object.

title: Sunbursts panel — sunbursts_panel
text: function generates grid sunbursts pieces

title: Sunbursts panel — sunbursts_panel
code: sunbursts_panel(   n = 100,   ncol = 4,   nrow = 4,   x_means = c(0, 10, 5),   y_means = c(0, 7, 8),   xy_var = 5,   low = "#4e0550",   high = "#facdfc",   s = 1234 )

title: Sunbursts panel — sunbursts_panel
text: n Granularity. Default 100. ncol Number column panels. Default 4. nrow Number row panels. Default 4. x_means Vector number means x-coordinate. Default c(0, 10, 5). y_means Vector number means y-coordinate. Default c(0, 7, 8). xy_var Numeric varaince x y points. Default 5. low Colour background. Default "#4e0550". high Colour sunburst points. Default "#facdfc". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Sunbursts panel — sunbursts_panel
text: ggplot object.

title: Vortex — vortex
text: function generates greyscale rainbow coloured generative art ggplot object shaped like vortex.

title: Vortex — vortex
code: vortex(n = 25, start_val = 90, col_scheme = "mono", bg_col = "black", s = 1234)

title: Vortex — vortex
text: n Number points. Default 25. start_val Starting position polar coordinates. Default 90. col_scheme Colour scheme art. One c("mono", "rainbow). Default 0.1. bg_col Background colour. Default "black". s Seed value. Default 1234.

title: Vortex — vortex
text: ggplot object.

title: Waves — waves
text: function generates generative art ggplot object sine cosine waves.

title: Waves — waves
code: waves(   a = 23,   b = 6,   linewidth = 0.5,   main_col = "black",   bg_col = "white",   s = 2021 )

title: Waves — waves
text: sine wave parameter. Default 23. b Cosine wave parameter. Default 6. linewidth Width lines. Default 0.5. main_col Vector colours (single colour) lines. Default "black". bg_col Background colour. Default "white". s Seed value. Default 2021.

title: Waves — waves
text: ggplot object.

title: Windows — windows
text: function generates coloured generative art ggplot object using rectangles.

title: Windows — windows
code: windows(   n_x = 10,   n_y = 10,   col_palette = PrettyCols::prettycols("Beach", n = 5),   linewidth = 2,   rayshade = FALSE )

title: Windows — windows
text: n_x Number squares per row. Default 10. n_y Number squares per column. Default 10. col_palette Vector colours. Default PrettyCols::prettycols("Beach", n = 5). linewidth Width borders around squares. Default 2. rayshade Boolean determining whether returned plot converted three dimensional using rayshader. TRUE, rayshader required installed. Default FALSE.

title: Windows — windows
text: ggplot object.
